analyzed: yang dag pa'i phyag rgyas gsang ba'i brda lan gyi byed pa ston pa le'u nyer gnyis pas bstan /

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa la rjes su chags pa'i bde ba ston pa'i mtshan ma bri bar byed pa le'u nyer gsum pas bstan /

analyzed: de kho na nyid dang ldan pa lam rim pa gnyis ka'i gsang spyod la 'jug pa le'u nyer brgyad pas bstan /

original: rigs ldan gyi khyad par las bde ba bsgrub cing dran pa nyer gzhag bstan pa dang / spyod pa'i dus nges pa dang bcas pa ston pa nus pa thob pa'i don ston pa le'u nyer dgu pas bstan /
analyzed: rigs ldan gyi khyad par las bde ba bsgrub cing dran pa nyer gzhag bstan pa dang / spyod pa'i dus nges pa dang bcas pa ston pa nus pa thob pa'i don ston pa le'u nyer dgu pas bstan /
translated: Chapter twenty-nine teaches the attainment of bliss from the special family member, the teaching of the applications of mindfulness, the definite time of conduct, and the meaning of attaining power.

analyzed: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhal bzhi pa'i sngags btu ba le'u sum cu pas bstan /

original: bza' ba'i dam tshig las dpa' bo'i snod dang ldan pas lag mchod rgyas par le'u so gcig pas bstan /
analyzed: bza' ba'i dam tshig las dpa' bo'i snod dang ldan pas lag mchod rgyas par le'u so gcig pas bstan /

original: dngos grub myur du sgrub cing ro langs bsgrub pa dang / he ru ka mngal skyes kyi mngon rtogs le'u so gnyis par bstan /
analyzed: dngos grub myur du sgrub cing ro langs bsgrub pa dang / he ru ka mngal skyes kyi mngon rtogs le'u so gnyis par bstan /
translated: Chapter 32 explains the swift accomplishment of siddhis and the accomplishment of the zombie, and the actualization of the womb-born heruka.

original: steng 'og sgo'i bye brag gis phyag rgya bzhi ldan lam du byed pa le'u so gsum pas so //
analyzed: steng 'og sgo'i bye brag gis phyag rgya bzhi ldan lam du byed pa le'u so gsum pas so //

analyzed: rim pa bzhi la gnas pa gtum mo 'bar 'dzag lam du gyur pa le'u so bzhi pas bstan /
translated: Chapter 34 explains the blazing and dripping of fierce fire that is made into the path through abiding in the four stages.

original: gsang ba dpyid dang thig le'i rnal 'byor nyi zla gza' 'dzin du bcas pa le'u so lnga pas bstan /
analyzed: gsang ba dpyid dang thig le'i rnal 'byor nyi zla gza' 'dzin du bcas pa le'u so lnga pas bstan /
translated: Chapter 35 explains the yoga of the secret spring and the bindu, along with the eclipse of the sun and moon.

original: rang 'od kyi rnal 'byor ma dam tshig phyag rgya dang / bde ba gsang ba byang sems kyi mchod pa bstan pa le'u so drug pas bstan /
analyzed: rang 'od kyi rnal 'byor ma dam tshig phyag rgya dang / bde ba gsang ba byang sems kyi mchod pa bstan pa le'u so drug pas bstan /
translated: Chapter 56 explains the mudra of the pledge, the yoginis of one's own radiance, and the offering of the secret bliss of bodhicitta.

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i bde ba chen po bsgrub pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya dbang du bya ba le'u so bdun pas bstan /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i bde ba chen po bsgrub pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya dbang du bya ba le'u so bdun pas bstan /
translated: Chapter 57 explains the wisdom mudra, which is the means of accomplishing the uncommon great bliss.

original: las dang po kun du bzang po dang / mgon po kun spyod dang / mnyam gzhag chen po dang / rig pa brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa le'u so brgyad pas bstan /
analyzed: las dang po kun du bzang po dang / mgon po kun spyod dang / mnyam gzhag chen po dang / rig pa brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa le'u so brgyad pas bstan /
translated: Chapter 58 explains the conduct of the beginner, the conduct of the protector, the great equipoise, and the conduct of the awareness hero.

analyzed: 'gro ba gzhan don gtsor bya ba mi rigs lnga la sogs pa dbang du bya ba le'u bzhi bcu pas bstan /
translated: Chapter 60 explains the means of magnetizing the five human families and so on, which are the principal means of benefiting other migrating beings.

translated: The thirty-first chapter explains that all activities are included in the twelve great activities and that, since one is intent on the supreme inner [activities], one will achieve [the supreme].

original: dbang gsum pa'i lam gsang ba dang / gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pas gzugs dang las kyi gsang ba le'u zhe gnyis pas bstan /
analyzed: dbang gsum pa'i lam gsang ba dang / gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pas gzugs dang las kyi gsang ba le'u zhe gnyis pas bstan /
translated: The thirty-second chapter explains the secret of form and the secret of activity, endowed with the nine expressions of dance, since one possesses the distinctions of the family.üîΩThe thirty-third chapter explains the creation of siddhis for the practitioner by the coemergent yoginis in the places and the neighboring places, and so on.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis rjes su 'dzin pa dang / dpal he ru ka'i nye ba'i snying po'i phrin las rmi lam du byed cing skye ba brtag pa dang / nad zhi bar byed pa la sogs pas rten 'brel gyi che ba du ma ston pa le'u zhe gsum pas bstan /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis rjes su 'dzin pa dang / dpal he ru ka'i nye ba'i snying po'i phrin las rmi lam du byed cing skye ba brtag pa dang / nad zhi bar byed pa la sogs pas rten 'brel gyi che ba du ma ston pa le'u zhe gsum pas bstan /
translated: The thirty-fourth chapter explains the great significance of dependent origination, such as being cared for by the yoginis, performing the activity of the essence of the glorious Heruka in dreams, examining the birth [of the practitioner], pacifying illness, and so on.

original: dpal he ru ka'i nye ba'i snying po dang / rnal 'byor ma drug gis las kyi phrin las bstan pa le'u zhe bzhi pa las so //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i nye ba'i snying po dang / rnal 'byor ma drug gis las kyi phrin las bstan pa le'u zhe bzhi pa las so //
translated: The forty-fourth chapter teaches the activity of the six yoginis and the essence of the glorious Heruka.

original: dpa' bo drug gi go cha'i las dbang du bya ba dang / ngag gi dbang phyug bsgrub pa ste le'u zhe lnga pas bstan /
analyzed: dpa' bo drug gi go cha'i las dbang du bya ba dang / ngag gi dbang phyug bsgrub pa ste le'u zhe lnga pas bstan /
translated: The forty-fifth chapter teaches the activity of the armor of the six heroes and the subjugation and accomplishment of the lord of speech.

original: ha lnga'i phrin las kha sbyar dbye zhing khrag dgug pa'i las zhe drug pas bstan to //
analyzed: ha lnga'i phrin las kha sbyar dbye zhing khrag dgug pa'i las zhe drug pas bstan to //
translated: The forty-sixth chapter teaches the activity of the union of the five ha and the activity of summoning blood.

translated: The forty-eighth chapter teaches the extensive mandala and the teaching of the lord of the accomplished secret mantra of the venerable lady, the forty-ninth chapter teaches the accomplishment of the seven-born, and the fiftieth chapter teaches the subjugation of beings by means of fire sacrifice.

original: gnas la sogs pa'i dbang phyug bstan pa lnga bcu pa'o //
analyzed: gnas la sogs pa'i dbang phyug bstan pa lnga bcu pa'o //

translated: The fifty-first chapter teaches the summary of realization, the function, the result tantra, and the yoga of the spontaneously born, and thus the summary of the treatise.

original: da ni yan lag gi tshig don rnam par bshad pa las /
analyzed: da ni yan lag gi tshig don rnam par bshad pa las /
